tittle.name: TANKS CAN TAKE IT
tittle.caption: Resilient bruisers, Tanks excel at shrugging off blows that would obliterate lesser allies.

tittle.name: FIGHTERS LOVE TO DUEL
tittle.caption: A balance of power and defence, Fighters are born to brawl, preferring their bouts up close and personal.

tittle.name: MAGES SURGE WITH POWER
tittle.caption: Aggressive casters, Mages seek to destroy opponents through a range of mystical attacks, spells and abilities.

tittle.name: ASSASSINS CRAVE THE HUNT
tittle.caption: Masters of precision, Assassins are agile hunters on the lookout for the perfect kill.

tittle.name: MARKSMEN BRING THE PAINT
tittle.caption: Ranged fighters, Marksmen are powerful but fragile. While they rely on their team to soak up damage, teams rely on them to deal it.

tittle.name: SUPPORTS HAVE YOUR BACK
tittle.caption: Stalwart defenders, Supports control the battlefield by augmenting allies and locking down enemies.
